## Chess.setHeader() method

Sets PGN header information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setHeader(header: Record<string, string>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  header | Record&lt;string, string&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```js
chess.setHeader({
  'White': 'Robert James Fischer',
  'Black': 'Mikhail Tal'
})

```
